AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: florist
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] explored a variety of flower plant species. [PAWN_pronoun] got a job on a spaceship, aiming to participate in various expeditions to other planets and expand [PAWN_possessive] professional horizons by getting acquainted with many exotic specimens.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: magic plant farm
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] worked on a special farm where grew magical plants for scientists and alchemists. [PAWN_pronoun] has gained extensive specialized knowledge in this field.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: zootranslator
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was well versed in animal biocommunication. [PAWN_pronoun] easily found a common language with them, calmed down, quickly understood and satisfied their urgent needs.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: druid
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: Thanks to outstanding magical talent, [PAWN_nameDef] could perform the most complex rituals aimed at manipulating natural forces. Even unicorns couldn't match [PAWN_possessive] skill.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: tamer of magical animals
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] devoted life to the search and capture of exotic, magical animals. [PAWN_pronoun] has been collecting [PAWN_possessive] collection for many years.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: hopeless operation
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: Unable to tolerate constant bullying towards [PAWN_possessive] race, [PAWN_nameDef] agreed to an experimental procedure for implanting horns and wings. The operation ended unsuccessfully and turned [PAWN_objective] into an invalid for a long time.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: stone farm
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: Tired of the endless bustle of the city, [PAWN_nameDef] found peace on a remote stone farm, which inherited. [PAWN_pronoun] cultivated various crystal cultures for magicians and jewelers.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: wingless pilot
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] admired the flight of pegasus and wanted to connect life with the air. [PAWN_pronoun] fulfilled [PAWN_possessive] dream by learning how to pilot flying machines.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: ascetic cook
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: Living among the representatives of the poor, [PAWN_nameDef] cooked simple but delicious dishes from herbal ingredients in a small public dining room. [PAWN_pronoun] learned to appreciate what [PAWN_pronoun] had.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: alchemist
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was fond of reading and medicinal herbs. [PAWN_pronoun] studied their beneficial properties, developing various preparations and preparing decoctions from them.
